start.speaker: Edrin
start.text:
The mark doesn’t fade. It doesn’t wash. It waits.

If you want me beside you, understand this: loud courage feeds the thing that hunts me.

choices.text: Then we do this quietly. Come with me.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Edrin’s eyes never stop scanning the distance. He’s not looking for enemies. He’s looking for patterns.
